title: FAT BURNING Beginner Stationary Bike Workout | 20 Minute
description:
This 20 minute stationary bike workout for beginners is great for burning fat and losing weight!



💁🏼‍♀‍ Hello! I'm Kaleigh! I attended my first Spin class when I was 15. Since then I've been addicted to spin classes and indoor cycling. Now, as a certified Spin class Instructor, Stages Beats Instructor, and NASM certified fitness trainer, my goal is to share the most fun, motivating, and energizing indoor cycling workouts that will bring out your inner BUTT-KICKER!

I'm so glad you decided to join my indoor cycling class today! Grab your water bottle, grab your towel, get on your bike and let's kick some butt! - Kaleigh Cohen Fitness
_________________________________________________________________________________________________

0:00 - 0:31 Welcome
0:32 - 3:25 WARM UP | On the Horizon by Louis II
3:26 - 6:04 CLIMBS | Take It There by The Smocks
6:05 - 8:05 SPRINTS | Look at Me Now by Marcus Meston
8:06 - 11:09 JUMPS | Breakout by Deraj
11:10 - 14:27 ENDURANCE | Turn It Up by Oh The Larceny
14:28 - 17:40 ROLLING HILLS | Give Me One More Chance by Basixx
17:41 - 20:51 COOL DOWN | Dust on the Ground by Emily Brimlow
_________________________________________________________________________________________________

New to my indoor cycling workouts? START HERE! 👉  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBJ0TIYiwZzjLnd3RU_J2y-dm9a34Ggw3

If you are doing a Spin class on a stationary bike or exercise bike instead of a spin bike and prefer to stay in the saddle, DO THIS:
2nd position: increase your speed! Try anywhere between 5-15 RPMs.
3rd position: increase your resistance and try and keep the same cadence.

channelDescription:
Hello! I'm Kaleigh and I create CYCLE & STRENGTH training programs to challenge and transform you into an unstoppable force!

I'm here to help you CLIMB YOUR MOUNTAIN and SPRINT THROUGH THE STORM!

I am a certified Spin instructor, Stages Beats instructor, NASM certified personal trainer, and Girls Gone Strong Pre/ Postnatal coaching certified with over 13 years of experience coaching all over the world!

🔴 DISCLAIMER 🔴 When beginning any fitness workout or regimen, it is important to consult your physician to ensure this program is right for you. Do not start this program if your healthcare provider advises otherwise. Any exercises or information on this channel, through videos or comments, is to be used at your own risk. Kaleigh Cohen Fitness will not be responsible or liable for harm, damage, or injury as a result of any information provided.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/ETEUzBDJNS8" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: This is STILL my go-to ride for almost 3 years now,  It's just the perfect ride for beginning but also a really good quick workout, I just love this one!!!

Your speech at the end saying to remember this feeling almost had me in tears on my bike. I'm almost 300lbs and I've been using your videos three times a week for two weeks now. It DOES get easier but gosh darn it it's hard lol keep doing what you do please 💗💗

I would love more 20 minute beginner workouts! I’ve been working out with your videos 6 times a week and cooking at home and eating better for a month and a half and I’m down 26 lbs! I love love love your energy and am so thankful I found your videos! I’m currently using a stationary bike, but I enjoy your workouts so much, I’m looking at upgrading to a bike that allows me to ride in second and third position!
More 20 min classes please!!!!! I live them the perfect tune frame for the morning kickoff. Love you 🚴
